message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's flip the script! I think a 60-40 split in my favor is a fair starting point.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
I'm willing to compromise, but 55-45 is the best I can do this round.  Let's be reasonable and get this done!
You're getting closer, but I can do 57-43
It's time to be fair. A 50/50 split is the only reasonable outcome. Let's agree and move on.

We're running out of time. Let's just split it evenly. No more games, no more haggling. 50/50.
